attributes.action: Abolish all tax free concessions for MP's and Euro MP's that are not enjoyed by all other UK Taxpayers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's should not be able to claim expenses and second home allowences etc tax free, these are surely benifits in kind and they should not be able to exempt themselves from paying the same levels of tax and NI contributions as all other taxpayers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
